dct_title_s: A NEW MAP of the WORLD according to the New Observations
dct_description_sm: Franting ye Introduction (top right). Pag 110 scratched out (top right, below title).
California show with two northern bays with N. Albion named. Str. of Annian to the north. Above the hemispheres sits a polar projection labeled NORTH POLE.
